event.description: Emilio Bonifacio walks.
With Chris Coghlan batting, Emilio Bonifacio caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Chris Iannetta to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki.
Chris Coghlan strikes out swinging.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a ground ball to third baseman Garrett Atkins.
Ross Gload grounds out, second baseman Omar Quintanilla to first baseman Todd Helton.
Dan Uggla flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
John Baker flies out to left fielder Seth Smith in foul territory.
Cody Ross strikes out on a foul tip.
Jeremy Hermida grounds out, first baseman Todd Helton to pitcher Aaron Cook.
Chris Volstad grounds out, first baseman Todd Helton to pitcher Aaron Cook.
Emilio Bonifacio grounds out to first baseman Todd Helton.

With John Baker batting, Aaron Cook picks off Ross Gload at 2nd on throw to Troy Tulowitzki.
John Baker grounds out, third baseman Garrett Atkins to first baseman Todd Helton.
Cody Ross pops out to second baseman Omar Quintanilla.
Jeremy Hermida walks.
Chris Volstad called out on strikes.
Emilio Bonifacio doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder Seth Smith.

Hanley Ramirez singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Emilio Bonifacio scores.
Ross Gload reaches on a force attempt, throwing error by pitcher Aaron Cook. Hanley Ramirez to 3rd.
Dan Uggla grounds into a force out, third baseman Garrett Atkins to second baseman Omar Quintanilla. Hanley Ramirez scores. Ross Gload out at 2nd. Dan Uggla to 1st.
John Baker walks. Dan Uggla to 2nd.
Cody Ross grounds into a force out, second baseman Omar Quintanilla to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki. John Baker out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Matt Daley replaces Aaron Cook, batting 9th, replacing Ryan Spilborghs.
Jeremy Hermida strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Alfredo Amezaga replaces Chris Volstad.
Alfredo Amezaga flies out to left fielder Seth Smith.
Emilio Bonifacio grounds out, second baseman Omar Quintanilla to first baseman Todd Helton.

Wes Helms flies out to left fielder Seth Smith.

Defensive Substitution: Clint Barmes replaces shortstop Troy Tulowitzki, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Pitching Change: Huston Street replaces Alan Embree, batting 5th, replacing third baseman Garrett Atkins.
Ian Stewart remains in the game as the third baseman.
Dan Uggla grounds out, pitcher Huston Street to first baseman Todd Helton.
John Baker doubles (8) on a fly ball to left fielder Seth Smith.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Cameron Maybin replaces John Baker.
Cody Ross reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Clint Barmes to second baseman Omar Quintanilla to third baseman Ian Stewart. Cameron Maybin out at 3rd.

Dexter Fowler bunt grounds out, pitcher Chris Volstad to first baseman Ross Gload.
Troy Tulowitzki homers (5) on a fly ball to right field.
Todd Helton triples (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Brad Hawpe out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Chris Coghlan. Todd Helton scores.
Garrett Atkins grounds out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Ross Gload.
Seth Smith grounds out, pitcher Chris Volstad to first baseman Ross Gload.
